If you're looking for something with a more comedic tone, "Witless Protection" might be more your style. It stars a charismatic cast in a quirky and suspenseful film about a small-town sheriff on a wild journey to save a damsel.

Finally, if you're interested in a more gritty and realistic portrayal of a troubled individual battling to reclaim his life, "The Wrestler" might be worth checking out.
